document_data.mainbody:
The Ssan, which was also called the Daughters, was a small archipelago near the Mother-Of-Mists island on the Trackless Sea.
The Ssan was located just off the coast of the northeast corner of the Mother-Of-Mists. The archipelago was also approximately  southwest of Baelrah on Sujs southern coast.
Several small islands composed the archipelago.
